attributes.action: We , the undersigned , demand that the Bristish Government start to protect Britian
attributes.additional_details: We demand that the Bristish Government pass laws to protect this beautiful country from further building of houses and roads that are only needed due to unlimited imigration which uses all our resourses. Therefore demanding that we build more and more till British countryside no longer exists and the damage done cannot be revoked .  ie , Bartons Farm and the proposed widening of the M3.We demand that you start to stand up for and defend the country you are elected for
